title: 5.4 fps drop
body: I was at 30 fps with all the high settings now I get 15 after the 5.4 patch .... now im unable to play

replies.body: I had 50 fps for a long time thwn one day went to 30 now 15 ... i have 6gb ram and this is wat i get ?

To be Honest Guys, i have the same problem:

yesterday i switched from GTX 750Ti to GTX 960 and i experience the same problems. Random FPS drops to 40-70 and i normally have about 150-200. 

Really annoying, cause i can see it quite hard when my 120Hz Monitor suddenly seems to stutter, cause the Framerate jumps from high to very low, always just for a few seconds.

I notice it is even more if I am in Base or near Nexus / Towers
I used to play with 60 fps normally but recently it's been hovering around 20-30 and dropping to as low as 8fps in team fights. I can no longer play this game as a result and I'm giving up.

Same here went from 80 fps to 8-23. Thats really bad for gameplay and  i dont recommend choosing movement prediction cause it ll get worse Anyway 
RITO PLEASE FIX XD{{champion:63}} {{summoner:11}} {{item:3070}}

do not understand. ever since the lunar revel patch my game is really lagging. my game should not be lagging as much as it is, since it never did it before. i go from 100 and something fps all the way down to 15-45. the low fps only lasts a few seconds but it is enough to get me killed.
went from ~100 to 30-50 :/ why is this happening to me  {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Plz up vote this so we can get our fps
RIP 200 fps... Welcome 20fps... {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Same problem here, i went to 110 to 60-70 and sometimes 30 when game lag so hard, i think it's about some animation of champion/summoner's rift, i had the problem after the 5.6 patch, pls rito fix
I got leaver bustered 5 match low priority queue BG Riot fuck you seriously {{summoner:14}} >>:/
I have like 10 low priorty queues just because of the fps drop so unfair
same here lol but i was in ranked when this happened so i got 9x reported lol
I don't know what to do. My fps was 60 the it drops to 3 fps. I tried everything recommended but it doesn't work. Help me.{{champion:238}}

All I know is I shouldn't have to shut off anti-aliasing to get my fps back. since anti-aliasing make the frames stable so you don't have missing frames when it fluxuates. I wish they would fix this client once and for all. I appreciate that it is free, and I love the game but, it isn't as fun when it doesn't work correctly.

If you restore default it takes off fps cap (which I want because I don't like frying my computer to play league at max settings) and it shuts off anti-aliasing (which I want because it makes your frame rate changes smooth and unnoticeable instead of fluctuating and unplayable even at 120 fps when it drops to 60 fps it fucks you out of so many frames at once you miss the whole first half of a team fight) but, it will give you better fps when no one is casting spells. I'm asking for my steady 80 fps back. That shouldn't be so difficult.

Same problem ;( i think its about time Riot finds out whats wrong (and i can say for sure that the problem isnt in us).Also they will probably never see this or if they stumble upon it they will simply ignore all of us and be like "hmmm have you done all the steps in our fps troubleshooting guide"
i used to run at 30 fps until it dropped to 11 in 5.4 but i just turned anti aliasing off and i run at 60
where is anti aliasing Plz tell me where to Find it Thanks
anyone knows what anit alising does anyway

Same problem here. 80 fps capped before patch, now it randomly drops to under 30, even 20. I've seen some people post that they have anti-aliasing on, and turning it off fixes the issue, but I already had it off. I've fiddled with all the settings and nothing seems to fix the issue except rebooting the client.
I had the same problem as you, person that's reading this, dropping from a constant 60 to a mere 15 fps :(. Try turning anti-aliasing off, it worked for me, if it doesn't work pray to rito.
bump
bump
Same.  Used to have 70 ping with about 20-30 fps, now I have 230 ping and 11 fps MAX.  I also have aliasing off.
Fix this please.
Bump

Hi guys, ive been having the same problem. I was running at 30fps before the patch and now im at 8fps. I just tried turning aliasing off and it worked for me! So, I recommend going and turning that off!
I'm down to 3 with a constant 500ping. when before patch i would get 60fps and 20ping.
Bump
everyone bump !

Same happend to me the only thing i can do is play sona and i still fail :/ FIX PLS !! 

i got from 35 to 15 :/
my frames dropped immensely, i've changed all my setting //  i'll try aliasing

BUMP! everyone plz start bumping. we msut b heard
ALSO: riot you PROMISED us that people can use SR2 even without gaming laptops... you said that people with regular computers could still play the game just fine... YOU LIED! + YOU KNOW IT!{{champion:7}}
Just turn any aliasing off, that fixed it for me

Riot Plz Know its on my PC Droped From 60 to 5-10 Fps God Its Like hell to me. Plz Fix the New Version My Lol Client is also Slow
{{summoner:6}} {{item:3117}}
Please someone help T_T
i got i7 3770k gtx 980 and drop to 60 fps !? WTF RITO?????

I used to play with 100-150 fps but recently it's been around 5 fps in team fights, if u cant fix this problem ill not play more this game,, im so sad of this buggs....... 

bye

BUMPING

As this just happened to me over the latest update and it is still not fixed. I used to average a solid 100-120 FPS without drop, now my game client struggles with 40 FPS.
Riot please fix it i tried everything but nothing works yesterday i play with 40/50 fps today i play with 5/10 -_-{{item:1075}}

Same here now I can't play my queen le blanc :(((( every time i m in team fights or burst some1 down fps goes 8 like what? I mite give up cause of this but before update I was reaching 30-39 fps and now 15-20 and even 8 fps and get lots of fps drops when something major happens..... Pls riot fix this for us please{{champion:7}}
why isn't there a red post here ...

Same thing fps dropped from 70-80 fps down to 27ish with the same exact settings prior to the update. Even lowering graphics settings barely helped. The only thing that helped my fps go back up was changing the resolution on full screen mode. Looks very distorted though...
Every game i play on my pc now drops frames and crashes the whole computer after about 15 minutes of playing.. this is just since downloading the new patch.. even steam games have this issue.

I havent experienced framerate drop, just my ping skyrocketed. Normally get about 90. Which is pretty good for NA on the East Coast. Today after the patch it was about 250 with spikes anywhere between 600 and 800 ping
I also went from 60 fps to 30 steady, with the same exact settings after patching.
Yea im having the same issue i was at 60fps and now i am at 20-30 plz help

It seems this happens after every damn patch, getting tired of this. Goes from 60+fps to 18... eventually they fix it after a bunch of people complain and all is well again, but can they just not do whatever it is they are doing every damn patch they release

Same thing happened to me. I'm on a mac I typically have 60-80 fps and I fluctuate between 15-30 now. Not sure why. I went to the FPS Support Guide and tried all 6 tips but nothing has changed. This sucks lol because it drops drastically at random times.
Same thing happened to me... 60 fps on very low then after patch 15 fps on very low... plz fiz riot :(
